messages.title: SARAH SAYS...
messages.content: Having served the people of Stroud District since 2004, raising my children and running a small business — the impact and practical politics, of housing insecurity, failing services and severe weather events are obvious. The mistakes of the elite are being paid for in our reduced security, services and safety. We need to prioritise you, your family and your community, to provide opportunity, education and housing for all and most importantly to create a secure low—carbon economy. Elect me to stand with you, to work for you.

messages.title: THIS ELECTION ISN'T ABOUT THE NEXT 5 YEARS. IT'S ABOUT THE NEXT 50 YEARS.
messages.content: The Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government's extreme Brexit. Only the Green Party has the vision to deliver an alternative future for our country, and our place in the world. And only the Green Party offers a different kind of politics.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Green Party is offering real opposition to this Government's extreme Brexit
Shaping an economy for everyone while preserving a safe environment
Build affordable homes and provide properly funded public services

issues.environment: The Green Party has the vision to deliver an alternative future for our country, and our place in the world.
issues.government: To put power back in your hands through a citizens' democracy.
issues.health: Stand with us for housing, schools, our NHS, our environment, and our future.
